Megatron looked at the two sadistic Decepticons. "Yes that's it, show
your hatred for this accursid planet." Megatron said with dry emotions
of hate. "For next time we fight the Maximals we will be prepared. All
Decepticons not on my mission, enter the Dark Avian." Megatron ordered.
